hero.title: AI-Powered Translation at Your Fingertips
hero.subtitle: Open-source translation tool supporting 55+ languages with multiple AI providers. Available as browser extension and desktop app.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need for seamless translation and language learning

multi_platform.title: Multi-Platform Support
multi_platform.description: Available as browser extension, desktop app, userscript, and clip extensions

languages.title: 55+ Languages
languages.description: Translate between all major world languages with high accuracy

ai_powered.title: Multiple AI Providers
ai_powered.description: Choose from OpenAI, Claude, Gemini, and 10+ other AI providers

privacy.title: Privacy-Focused
privacy.description: Your data stays private. Choose your own AI provider and API keys

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.description: Instant translations with streaming responses for real-time feedback

vocabulary.title: Vocabulary Book
vocabulary.description: Save and review words with memory aids and spaced repetition

tts.title: Text-to-Speech
tts.description: Listen to pronunciations in multiple languages and voices

ocr.title: OCR Translation
ocr.description: Translate text from screenshots and images instantly

platforms.title: Available Everywhere
platforms.subtitle: Use nextai translator on all your devices with seamless sync

browser.title: Browser Extensions
browser.description: Install directly from your browser's extension store

desktop.title: Desktop Apps
desktop.description: Native applications for Windows, macOS, and Linux

others.title: More Options
